name: The Forest (itch) (Curiosity Motive)
description:
You awake in the forest. How did you get here? Where are you going? You seem to have a compass with no markings to be seen other than a direction in which to go. Will you make your way home?

This game was the 2017 JS13KGames entry by Curiosity Motive contributor Alex Porter, known as @streetalchemist everywhere else. You can see the entry page here!

Credits:
Development, art, sound - Alex Porter
